com.googlecode.streamflyer.regex
Class ReplacingProcessor

java.lang.Object
  com.googlecode.streamflyer.regex.ReplacingProcessor
All Implemented Interfaces:
MatchProcessor
public class ReplacingProcessor
extends Object
implements MatchProcessor

This MatchProcessor replaces the matching text (given by the MatchResult) with the configured replacement.

The replacement can be defined with the same syntax as defined by Matcher.appendReplacement(StringBuffer, String)

EXAMPLES: 

new ReplacingProcessor("aaa") // replaces each match with "aaa"
new ReplacingProcessor("$2") // replaces each match with the content of the second group of the match
new ReplacingProcessor("aaa$2bbb$1ccc") // replaces each match with "aaa$2bbb$1ccc"
                           // wherein $2 and $1 are replaced with the content
                           // of the second and the first group of the match

Since:
18.06.2011
Author:
rwoo

Field Detail

parts

private List<Object> parts
This list contains Strings and Numbers. The latter ones refer to groups.

replacementWithoutGroupReferences

private CharSequence replacementWithoutGroupReferences
If not null, then the replacement do not uses groups. Then this property contains the entire replacement.
